mapper.insert: insert into board(member_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) values ( #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id as boardId, m.id, m.name, b.title, b.created_at as createdAt, b.updated_at as updatedAt FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = b.member_id

SELECT b.board_id as boardId, m.id, m.name, b.title, b.content, b.created_at as createdAt, b.updated_at as updatedAt FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = b.member_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = now() where board_id = #{boardId} and member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE from board where board_id = #{boardId} and member_id = #{memberId}
